sections.heading: Seller's agent or landlord's agent; powers and duties; confidentiality; immunity; disclosures required
sections.text: (1) A licensee representing a seller or landlord as a seller's agent or a landlord's agent shall be a limited agent with the following duties and obligations:(a) To perform the terms of the written

sections.heading: and subdivision (3)(a) of this section do not limit a seller's agent's duty to disclose facts only when he or she has actual knowledge of the existence of a material defect or only when he or she has knowledge that a home needs extensive repair
